name: Semble AI
long_description:
Semble AI automates fire-life-safety design. Instantly generate code-compliant device layouts, bills of materials (BOMs), and quote estimates. Replace guesswork with AI - getting it right the first time and allowing teams to produce bids in minutes, not weeks.

No missed devices or materials. 
No regulation lookups. 
No back-and-forth with permitting authorities.
No overrun cost surprises.

Semble AI is the new standard for fire-life-safety.
one_liner: Autonomous fire and life-safety systems engineer
